CustomField.formula:
IF( text(Project_ID__r.Markup_Method__c) =='RSMeans - O&P',
(Markup__r.Bid_Factor__c*(Total_Cost__c*(1 + Markup__r.Market_Escalation__c))),
Total_Including_Markups__c *(1 + Markup__r.CMc__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Professional_Services_Fees_Preconst__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Developer_Fee__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Professional_Services_Developer_Fee__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Lessor_Fee__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Professional_Services_Lessor_Fee__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Gross_Receipt_State_Construction__c) *(1 + Markup__r.Market_Escalation__c) )
CustomField.label: ECCA
